name: @layered/extension
description: Extendable and nested settings for VSCode with full file watching

layered-settings.autoGitignore.description: Automatically add layered.json to .gitignore when auto-capturing settings

layered-settings.validation.severity.description: Severity level for unknown setting diagnostics

scripts.build: bun build src/extension.ts --outdir out --target node --format cjs --external vscode --external vscode-json-languageservice --no-sourcemap
scripts.watch: bun build src/extension.ts --outdir out --target node --format cjs --external vscode --external vscode-json-languageservice --no-sourcemap --watch
scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration
scripts.test:single-root: bun run build && bun run build:test && vscode-test -l single-root
scripts.test:multi-root: bun run build && bun run build:test && vscode-test -l parent-owned
scripts.test:integration: bun run test:single-root && bun run test:multi-root
